metadata.job_to_be_done: Prepare a vegetarian buffet-style dinner menu for a corporate gathering, including gluten-free items.

extracted_sections.section_title: o Arrange meats, cheeses, olives, and vegetables on a platter. o Serve with breadsticks
o Dice tomatoes, onion, and cucumber. o Mix vegetables with chopped cilantro, lemon juice, and salt. o Serve chilled
o Prepare each side dish separately. o Arrange on small plates. o Serve as accompaniments to the main meal
o Serve as a dip or side dish
o Assorted small side dishes like pickled radish, spinach, bean sprouts, kimchi
